I think people are overthinking, They got drugged(Most people wont remember the night and if you spike someone it is considered a crime IRL) and raped. They didn't enjoy it even the mom says that when she went to the guy's hotel that it feels different. But still she had no choice but to meet him in the hotel as she feared for yuu and her daughters. She might have felt some pleasure(duh it's sex) but eventually she and the sisters didn't give in to it. They got the rapist arrested and probably got abortion too.

Yuu realizes that he should improve himself and stop taking advantage of the women once he saw that his coomer brain was making their life lustful, You can see him making plans to exercise and get stronger. Yuu is just a teenager and he has more room to grow in height as well as size. I hope he will be a chad and take care of their step family needs once he becomes successful.

PS/// this comment is about manga, Novel is irrelevant and most people won't even consume it

My point is that from ancient times people saw and wished for weak(hard working and kind one to be precise) to triumph over strong. Even today you can see countless works done in this regard. So people who wish bad things to weak ones are cultural and genetical failures

I hate main characters that have no eyes(not included the ones who have slightly long hair which covers their eye). Its feels so soulless. Also hate it getting is not really about ntr though after all this tag pretty loosely defined. I mean it can be either neterore or netori. The the main thing that matter is themes. Because you can get happy ntrs like these 83588, 268598, 275397 and worse ntrs like this. So thing that now I am going to write will be aimed at cultural disorder. Ever since the ancient times most literature were about young hero saving fair maiden from disgusting giant monsters that hundred times their size or youngest of the brother(or once a weak boy) getting the fair maiden through wisdom. Later one is even more frequent in the founding myth of the nations. Examples like Turkic people who trace their ancestors to one alone boy who left alone to die, or Borjigins whose ancestor was the youngest son of "something with an eye" and left with nothing but a single horse.

People from the WEST wouldn't understand, how much the MC and Japanese people are alike, and like how this country suffers from low birthrates. Because, a country like Japan has one of the most discipline country in regards to their ill nature. Well expect them to be one of the top countries w/ a very low crimerates around the world. 

This story almost relates just how "Tan" guys represents people from the west, which affecting both cultures, and also the mindset on why the "MC is so stupid", which a simple answer to that. Is that they tolerate, to act mindless. U may think this is a good solution to just call a police, but what the aftershock of these females experience. Will change how they act normally. Given on how much freedom a country give us. But w/o discipline. We all go on a wrong path. More likely the West ppl

Of course they have abouve average penises but that dosn't automaticaly mean that can use them right. They have trained hard, sharpened their willpower, learned special seduction technics and transformed their bodies into a extraordinary shape by hard work. They are role models of something anyone of us can reach if he has enough willpower ans stamina. It's been quite a while since the last time I commented on this manga. A year, I guess? Well, I wouldn't say I'm into NTR but this one made me nut like crazy. I personally give 5 stars to the art but the story, I would give 2 since the MC is pretty weak.. no, very weak and he couldn't do anything about it because of the drug he drank earlier that made him unable to get his senses back. For these past years, I've been imagining whatever happened to them ever since that "incident", what should've happened before that so that they wouldn't be in that kind of situation and what should happen if somebody were to know what's going there. And it's not like I blamed the MC for not be able to do something. I blamed nobody. And the girls then? Well, I would say women in hentai would fall apart (of course, in a particular way) after something that they hadn't had before, for example, like those girls in this hentai. They experienced something that MC couldn't give and you know what that is.
